directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; arrange half the plantain pieces, without overlapping, in the hot oil. Cook until lightly browned, about 2 minutes per side; drain plantains on a paper towel-lined plate. Repeat with remaining plantain pieces. Serve hot with sour cream.
ingredients: 2 large plantains, peeled and sliced into 1-inch pieces
2 teaspoons sour cream, or to taste (optional)
title: My Mum-In-Law's Lightly Fried Plantains
